name: Kettlebell Workouts
description: Developing functional strength and movement efficiency using kettlebell exercises.

cards.title: Kettlebell Swings for Explosive Power
cards.description: A powerful hip-hinge movement that builds explosive strength and endurance.
bulletpoints: Engage the hips and core to generate momentum
Keep the back straight and avoid excessive knee bending
Use a controlled motion to maintain efficiency and safety
cards.summaryText: Snap swings from the hips so power and endurance climb together.

cards.title: Turkish Get-Up for Full-Body Control
cards.description: A complex movement requiring coordination, stability, and strength.
bulletpoints: Maintain a strong grip on the kettlebell throughout the movement
Follow a step-by-step approach to ensure controlled execution
Use lighter weights initially to focus on technique
cards.summaryText: Flow through each get-up checkpoint with locked-in control before loading heavier.
